title: 109. Textile Capitalism and Architectural Patronage with Dan Williamson
itunes:title: 109. Textile Capitalism and Architectural Patronage with Dan Williamson
description: This week, we continue interrogating the modern nationalist project in India, its legacy and implications for thinking the present with Dan Williamson, professor and scholar of Mid-century Ahmedabad. We learn why and how Amedabad, a city in Western India, came to be home to some of the best and most amazing advances in Indian Modernism.
